common_questions: tell me about your on-site interview experience?
interview_tips: on what I can improve on
to you is if you know what field you're interested in, make it absolutely clear to the recruiter that that is your choice
I would get to move on to their next step with an actual interview with an actual person
red_flags: think the quality of my responses are the factor, especially when I spent about a day on question

process_insights.format: Mix of technical, behavioral, on-site, virtual
